name: Escape Covid Camp
description:
Contained within a world of steel, this is not the life you chose. Explore your new home that saps the souls of all who it contains. Fabricate a plan to escape this world force upon you. Freedom is your mission.



  • Craft food in the cafeteria to trade with others.
  • Trade with other inhabitants of the camp to receive items useful in escaping.
  • Set traps for the unsuspecting guards to fall victim to.
  • Make a run for the forest. Just don't get caught!
  • Scavenge camp for useful resources.
